content.raw:
Setup a simpler docking test in the `easier_dock_ex` branch.  The active/correct bay is the one right in front of the wamv.  Used teleop to drive wamv into the correct bay.

Scenario

* roslaunch vrx\_gazebo dock.launch verbose:=true
* rostopic echo /vrx/task/info
* roslaunch vrx\_gazebo usv\_joydrive.launch

    * Use gamepad to drive wamv into bay
    

The ScanDockPlugin detects that the wamv docks,  detects that it is the correct bay, and transitions the plugin to Finished state.

The published score does not appear to increment.  Default values for dockBonusPoints and correctDockBonusPoints \([#!/osrf/vrx/src/default/vrx\_gazebo/include/vrx\_gazebo/scan\_dock\_scoring\_plugin.hh](#!/osrf/vrx/src/default/vrx_gazebo/include/vrx_gazebo/scan_dock_scoring_plugin.hh)\) are 10 points each, so expected that the last published score should be 20 points.

‌

‌
content.html:
Setup a simpler docking test in the easier_dock_ex branch. The active/correct bay is the one right in front of the wamv. Used teleop to drive wamv into the correct bay.

Scenario

  • roslaunch vrx_gazebo dock.launch verbose:=true
  • rostopic echo /vrx/task/info

  • roslaunch vrx_gazebo usv_joydrive.launch

    • Use gamepad to drive wamv into bay

The ScanDockPlugin detects that the wamv docks, detects that it is the correct bay, and transitions the plugin to Finished state.

The published score does not appear to increment. Default values for dockBonusPoints and correctDockBonusPoints (#!/osrf/vrx/src/default/vrx_gazebo/include/vrx_gazebo/scan_dock_scoring_plugin.hh) are 10 points each, so expected that the last published score should be 20 points.

‌

‌
